column1: Little Goat Diner////The restaurant has a great ambiance and seems to be quite busy all the time. The food took a bit of time to come out...but maybe because I was starving and was slightly impatient when it came to waiting. BUT
column2: IT WAS SO WORTH THE WAIT. My meal was so delicious the biscuit was so moist and sweet which was a nice contrast to the bradade sauce. The concoction was unique but melded so well. I was so excited about my choice. I tasted a bit of the Shrimp and Cheesy Grits
column3: it was good but I liked my dish so much more. To me it was similar to a pasta...not bad but NOT AS DELICIOUS AS MINE...at least in my opinion. The BF and I argued a bit about whose tasted better and I think mine did. LOL.
